Actions.Name: Sea Legs
Actions.Description: Shove all adjacent characters 1 space in the same direction.
Actions.Collide: Foes are dazed. Dazed foes are stunned.

Actions.Name: Plunder
Actions.Description: The Sailor dashes 1, then deals 2 damage and shoves an adjacent foe 1.

Actions.Name: Send to Erenhelion
Actions.Description: The Sailor winds up for a massive blow. An adjacent foe must save or take 3[D]+[fray] and become dazed, or just [D]+[fray] on a successful save.
Actions.Effects: The Sailor takes damage equal to 25% of their max hp.
